segment.source: When submitting an IAP, the info you providewill be displayed to your app's customers.
segment.target: When submitting an IAP, the info you providewill be displayed to your app's customers.

segment.source: Create IAP descriptions
segment.target: Create IAP descriptions

segment.source: Create IAP descriptions
segment.target: Create IAP descriptions

segment.source: When submitting an IAP, the info you provide in the Descriptions step will be displayed to your app's customers.
segment.target: When submitting an IAP, the info you provide in the Descriptions step will be displayed to your app's customers.

segment.source: Make sure to consider the description carefully in order to represent your IAP accurately in a way that makes it appealing to customers.
segment.target: Make sure to consider the description carefully in order to represent your IAP accurately in a way that makes it appealing to customers.

segment.source: You can provide customized descriptions for different languages.
segment.target: You can provide customized descriptions for different languages.

segment.source: Languages
segment.target: Languages

segment.source: Before you can enter description info, you need to specify one or more languages.
segment.target: Before you can enter description info, you need to specify one or more languages.

segment.source: We recommend providing descriptions for every language your app supports.
segment.target: We recommend providing descriptions for every language your app supports.

segment.source: Under the Descriptions section of your IAP’s submission, click Manage description languages, then click Manage languages on the next page.
segment.target: Under the Descriptions section of your IAP’s submission, click Manage description languages, then click Manage languages on the next page.

segment.source: Check the boxes for the languages that you’d like to add, then click Update.
segment.target: Check the boxes for the languages that you’d like to add, then click Update.

segment.source: The languages that you’ve selected will be displayed in the Description languages section of the page.
segment.target: The languages that you’ve selected will be displayed in the Description languages section of the page.

segment.source: To remove one or more of these languages, click Remove (or click Manage languages and uncheck the box for languages you’d like to remove).
segment.target: To remove one or more of these languages, click Remove (or click Manage languages and uncheck the box for languages you’d like to remove).

segment.source: Click Save when you're happy with the list of languages.
segment.target: Click Save when you're happy with the list of languages.

segment.source: Tip To add and remove additional languages, click Manage description languages from the IAP submission overview.
segment.target: Tip To add and remove additional languages, click Manage description languages from the IAP submission overview.

segment.source: To edit a description, click the language name on the IAP submission overview.
segment.target: To edit a description, click the language name on the IAP submission overview.

segment.source: The info you can enter for each language is described below.
segment.target: The info you can enter for each language is described below.

segment.source: Title
segment.target: Title

segment.source: You must provide a title here, which is the name your customers will see for this IAP.
segment.target: You must provide a title here, which is the name your customers will see for this IAP.

segment.source: Your title can be up to 100 characters.
segment.target: Your title can be up to 100 characters.

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: If you'd like to display more info than just a title, you can enter up to 200 characters here.
segment.target: If you'd like to display more info than just a title, you can enter up to 200 characters here.

segment.source: This field is optional.
segment.target: This field is optional.

segment.source: Icon
segment.target: Icon

segment.source: You also have the option to provide an image that may be displayed when the user buys the product.
segment.target: You also have the option to provide an image that may be displayed when the user buys the product.

segment.source: This icon must be a .png file that measures exactly 300 x 300 pixels.
segment.target: This icon must be a .png file that measures exactly 300 x 300 pixels.
